long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This or That - The Ultimate Decision Maker!

Stuck choosing between two options? Let "This or That" help! This Chrome extension simplifies decision-making by presenting you with two predefined choices. Simply pick one, and move on with confidence.

How It Works:
Two Options, One Choice: See two given options and select the one you prefer.
Clean and Simple Interface: No clutter, just quick decisions.
Great for Fun or Serious Choices: Use it for casual fun (like "Cats or Dogs?") or to make real-life decisions.
Stop overthinking—choose with ease using "This or That"! Perfect for polls, quick comparisons, or everyday fun.

Use our This or That extension - to make yourself even happier!
